message.content:
{"id": "31627", "title": "Bug 31627DBCS: Perspective change caused core dump after adding DBCS project to the workspace", "description": "Language: Japanese
Build driver: eclipseSDKI20030211linuxgtk
OS: RedHat8 (Japanese: locale jaJP.eucJP), gtk 2.2
JDK Ver. : IBM JDK1.3.1 + SR3
Summary: DBCS: Perspective change caused core dump after adding DBCS project to the workspace

Description:
Steps to recreate problem:
1. [Add more steps here]

OB:

EB: Clicking the 'Resource Perspective' icon in the shortcut bar causes a core dump. Please see the attached file (cvsdefect.zip).

SR: Create a project using DBCS characters (あいうえお(あいうえお)). Right-click the project and select 'Team -> Share project...'. Select the CVS repository and choose 'Use project name as module name', then click 'Finish'. Select the project in the Synchronize view. Right-click on the project and select 'Add Version Control', 'Commit', and 'Delete' (with 'also delete contents under /workspace folder name' selected). Change the perspective to CVS perspective. Expand the repository and HEAD. Right-click on the DBCS project and select 'Check Out As Project'. [Add more steps if necessary]"}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '31627', 'title': 'Bug 31627DBCS: Perspective change caused core dump after adding DBCS project to the workspace', 'description': 'Language: JapaneseBuild driver: eclipseSDKI20030211linuxgtkOS: RedHat8(Japanese: locale jaJP.eucJP), gtk 2.2JDK Ver. : IBM JDK1.3.1 + SR3Summary: DBCS: Perspective change caused core dump after adding DBCS projectto the workspaceDescription:Steps to recreate problem:1. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'Click "Resource Perspective" icon at the shortcut bar.<<ErrorAfter step 12, the workbench core dump.Please refer the attachment (cvsdefect.zip)<<Expected ResultIt should change the perspective successfully without core dump. ', 'SR': 'Create a project using DBCS characters (あいうえお(\\u3042\\u3044\\u3046\\u3048\\u304A))2. Rightclick the project and select TeamShare project...3. Select the CVS repository4. Select the "Use project name as module name" and Finish5. Select the project at the Synchonize view6. Rightclick on the project and select "Add Version Control"7. Rightclick on the project and select "Commit"8. Rightclick on the project and select "Delete" (Select "also deletecontents under /workspace folder name")9. Change the perspective to CVS perspective10. Expand the repository and HEAD11. Rightclick on the DBCS project and Select "Check Out As Project"12. '}
